00045 #pragma once
00046 #ifndef AI_COLOR4D_H_INC
00047 #define AI_COLOR4D_H_INC
00048 
00049 #include "defs.h"
00050 
00051 #ifdef __cplusplus
00052 
00053 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00056 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057 template <typename TReal>
00058 class aiColor4t
00059 {
00060 public:
00061     aiColor4t () : r(), g(), b(), a() {}
00062     aiColor4t (TReal _r, TReal _g, TReal _b, TReal _a)
00063         : r(_r), g(_g), b(_b), a(_a) {}
00064     explicit aiColor4t (TReal _r) : r(_r), g(_r), b(_r), a(_r) {}
00065     aiColor4t (const aiColor4t& o)
00066         : r(o.r), g(o.g), b(o.b), a(o.a) {}
00067 
00068 public:
00069     // combined operators
00070     const aiColor4t& operator += (const aiColor4t& o);
00071     const aiColor4t& operator -= (const aiColor4t& o);
00072     const aiColor4t& operator *= (TReal f);
00073     const aiColor4t& operator /= (TReal f);
00074 
00075 public:
00076     // comparison
00077     bool operator == (const aiColor4t& other) const;
00078     bool operator != (const aiColor4t& other) const;
00079     bool operator <  (const aiColor4t& other) const;
00080 
00081     // color tuple access, rgba order
00082     inline TReal operator[](unsigned int i) const;
00083     inline TReal& operator[](unsigned int i);
00084 
00086     inline bool IsBlack() const;
00087 
00088 public:
00089 
00090     // Red, green, blue and alpha color values
00091     TReal r, g, b, a;
00092 };  // !struct aiColor4D
00093 
00094 typedef aiColor4t<ai_real> aiColor4D;
00095 
00096 #else
00097 
00098 struct aiColor4D {
00099     ai_real r, g, b, a;
00100 };
00101
